    and get advantage of our competitive prices.

ABOUT US

In 2010 we launced Godspeed Mobiles Technology as a professional mobile phones and phone parts supplier. Our outlet has grown to over 3 successful branches across the globe. During the early stages, we get to know how most companies are really struggling to find a right mobile supplier to cater for their needs based on quality service, we felt the people’s needs were simple- high-quality parts, a reliable service, and reasonable prices.

READ MORE

WE PROVIDE

FASTEST SHIPPING

We provide the fastest shipping in the industry

Returns/Exchange Policy

In case of RMA we provide you 30-90 Days Warranty

ACCEPTING ORDERS 24/7

With our extensive staff for different time zones, we are available 24/7 for you

Payment Terms

We only accept Bank Wires in any currency to our HSBC company Account

our BRANDS
